body.p:
Frankfort Ky 30th Mch 1865
Major W. H. Hays
Inspector General of kentucky.
Major.

I have been written to by numerous acquaintances in Lewis County & requested by them to represent, through you to His Excellency the Governor, the expediency of entrusting the Command of any active State troops for that county to Capt Joseph W. Cottingham.

I have a very intimate personal knowledge of Captain Cottingham's merits as an officer. He served under my command for two (2) years and under all circumstances approved himself an officer of judgement, courage and activity.
As I know the loyal men of Lewis County quite generally, I feel safe in saying that I think the appointment of Capt Cottingham would be highly satisfactory --

I have the honor to be
Very respectfully yr Obt Svt
Jno. Mason Brown
late Col 45 Ky Vols

Lewis
Jos. W. Cottingham
Lewis Co. Ky.
Recommended as Capt. of Active Militia in Lewis County, by Col. John M Brown
answered April 10/'65
